description: Adds a cooldown to the item so that, after performing an action of the specified "type", all items with a "minecraft:cooldown" component in the same "category" become unable to perform that same type of action for the number of seconds defined in "duration".

category.description: All items sharing the same "category" are put on cooldown when an action of the specified "type" is performed.

duration.description: Duration of the cooldown, in seconds, before the item can perform an action of the specified "type" again.

type.description: The type of action the cooldown applies to. Options are mutually exclusive, so cooldown for one type of action does not affect the others. Values: "use" (when using an item), "attack" (when attack with an item). Default value: use.
type.title: ItemCooldownType

title: minecraft:cooldown
